title: That moment when you dart down lane as an 800 MS Yi at the enemy team...
body:
And then you get feared by Fiddlesticks...

http://media.giphy.com/media/3xz2BwnlA1g9CDvsYg/giphy.gif

replies.body:
so you get feared in the opposite direction at 800 movespeed. seems legit.
CANNOT BE SLOWED
CANNOT BE SLOWED
CANNOT BE SLOWED
CANNOT BE SLOWED
"Shit I forgot to turn off the gas"
This is my favorite thing about playing fiddle, though. I jump for joy when I'm fiddle against a Yi.

Remember when Yi ult made him immune to fears and squirrels?
THe horror.

>THe horror.

but he was immune to fear

That reply.
I like that.
But what about the squirrels?
Quadrafacepalm

Where's my Penta?

WHERE'S MY PENTA!?!
or you run straight into a Veigar wall. :D
I read this as latency. LOL
Try 1200+MS with Quinn
I once ran down an ulting Yi, that had mobi boots and an active ghost blade with Quinn's ult once.
was playing quinn top and sivir was our adc, reached yi mid in 4 seconds from spawn and even though he ulted i still caught him
Then instantly got all your movespeed taken away when you started your melee attacks ^^
1.8k with Rammus. Purely off of actives and movement speed. Probably not a world-record, but still an accomplishment.
What if you both ran past each other without noticing?

i remember i played fiddle once and i did that our team was at their inhib my fear was maxed he had homeguards ult youmuus and a few ms items *shiv tri bork* and he used bork on the adc and i feared him... he ran all the way back to fountain
You deserve it Devourer scum.
And what if he went top lane?

{{champion:9}} HA! i get to LIVE
{{champion:11}}  guide me wuju style "click" {{summoner:1}} now where was i?
That gif made me laugh. Well done.
Needs moar facepalms!
I did that on ARAM with 1k MS.
